document.full_text: oklahoma fired coach jeff capel on monday after he followed a trip to the ncaa tournament's regional finals with the program's first back-to-back losing seasons since 1967.
document.title: oklahoma fires jeff capel after 2 losing seasons
lines_and_colors: oklahoma fired coach jeff capel on monday after he followed a trip to the ncaa tournament's regional finals with the program's first back-to-back losing seasons since 1967.
